actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Training.

committees.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

official_title: To prohibit the National Endowment for the Humanities to provide funds to carry out the Popular Romance Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.
subjects: National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities

summary.text: Prohibits the National Endowment for the Humanities from providing funds to carry out the Popular Romance Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.

titles.title: To prohibit the National Endowment for the Humanities to provide funds to carry out the Popular Romance Project or any similar project relating to love or romance.
